actions.description: The knight makes two Glaive attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Glaive

specialTraits.description: The knight can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: The knight can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.
specialTraits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads

specialTraits.description: The knight's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
specialTraits.name: Standing Leap
